House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00554
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PRESCRIBING URGENT RELATED MEASURES NECESSARY AND PROPER TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE TRAFFIC CRISIS IN METRO MANILA AND FOR PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Metro Manila Traffic Crisis Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Declares it a State policy to adopt adequate and effective measures to address the traffic crisis in Metro Manila that has disrupted the country’s economic and social life and assume the nature and magnitude of a public calamity.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA, FERNANDO, BAYANI F.
